thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 12 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Baoding Tianwei Baobian Electric Revises Share Private Placement, Plans To Obtain Financing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Baoding Tianwei Baobian Electric Revises Share Private Placement, Plans To Obtain Financing

organizations.name: baoding tianwei baobian electric co ltd

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Baoding Tianwei Baobian Electric Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT REVISES SHARE PRIVATE PLACEMENT PLAN, TO RAISE UP TO 1.13 BILLION YUAN ($174.98 million)
* SAYS IT AIMS FINANCING OF UP TO 15 BILLION YUAN IN 2018 * SAYS IT AIMS TO OBTAIN CREDIT OF 30.5 BILLION YUAN IN 2018 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2mnCXQZ ; bit.ly/2DmUHE9 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4580 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
